Posted by Soliddough on Demonoid - seems to be working:

"Found a solution to the inability to install it on the clonedvd version. If you have an archiving software like 7zip, you can open the .exe file. In it you will find a $[34] folder. That folder contains a 1 on 1 copy of all the files you need in the packages folder. So copy it, and merge it into the existing /Dragon Age 2/Packages/ folder. Open up the dragon age launcher, go to config, and you should now be able to pick the high resolution option.

Hope that helped!"

Be warned, this texture pack is extremely resource intensive. If your graphics card doesn't have a lot of memory, you're going to suffer a huge hit in performance. 1GB cards can utilize this pack well, 512MB, 768MB cards can 'try', but you'll notice the performance drag, especially if you're playing on high resolutions.
